VoiceList.Entry: Cloud “Sephiroth's energy barrier is gone…”
Cloud “Cid! Can the Airship get inside?”
Cloud “Right,sorry about that.”
Barret “Yo,Cait Sith! Now what?”
Cid “Huh? He's my pilot,ain't he!? Of course he can go anywhere!”
Cait Sith “Hold it!”
Cait Sith “Scarlet! Heidegger! What's going on?”
Cloud “Can't you stop the Mako reactor?”
Cloud “Must stop Hojo…first.”
Barret “YO! Do somethin'! Ya big cat!”
Barret “You're busted,Reeve!”
“Too late tryin' to hide it now…”
Barret “You're from Shinra,ain't ya? So why's it impossible!?”
Barret “An explosion!!”
Barret “Damn!”
Cid “We came a long way to get here. You better not double-cross us now!”
Cid “You damn fool! Don't you understand anything I'm saying?”
“I don't give a damn about Shinra. If you're a man… no,if you're a human being, you'll save the planet! Don't you even care?”
Cid “Why? Can't you just shut off the valve?”
Cait Sith “We're sunk. Hojo's doing this on his own…”
“I don't like this…”
Cait Sith “Forget that…the CANNON! We've got to get to Midgar! That's the first thing!!”
Cait Sith “…We can't stop it.”
Cait Sith “…”
Cait Sith “I can't make you trust me…”
Cait Sith “No way! If we shut down the reactor, all hell will break loose!!”
Cait Sith “Yeah,it's easy to shut off the reactor's pipe valves…”
“But the reactor made a path for the energy to escape from below.”
“Once you open that, it'll be impossible to close it until everything blasts out…”
“And we can't try to stop the energy from gushing out…”
Cait Sith “This blast'll be way stronger than when the Sector 1 Reactor blew up!”
Cloud “I know!”
Cait Sith “But!”
“But you'll come,won't you!?”
Cid “Hey!”
Cid “I'm leaving the ship in your hands!”
“I'm heading for Midgar!”
Barret “Even if we get there, Midgar's under martial law!”
“There'll be no way we could slip into the slums.”
Tifa “Looks like all transportation from the slums is cut off…”
Cid “Hey,hey,whaddya think we have Highwind for?”
“Where are we now!?”
Barret “Huh? Where are we?”
Cid “If land's no go… We'll go by air!”
Cloud “Okay then! We'll parachute into Midgar!!”
“We've reached Midgar!”
